referenceObject.reference: Domènech, M., Calatayud-Mascarell, A., Pérez-Gómez, Á., Giacomelli, M., Iglesias Baquero, A., Mojica, M., Guerrero, J. J., Arnedo, M. A. & Lozano-Fernandez, J. (2025). Description of the first continental European species of the huntsman spider Cebrennus (Araneae, Sparassidae), confirming the presence of the genus in the region. Zoologischer Anzeiger 318: 178-186.
